title: Education and Learning 2
sentences: I can't find my notes from yesterday's class.
I have to do the math homework for tomorrow.
Can you erase the blackboard, please?
es el momento favorito de los niños.
Recess is the children's favorite moment.
I have to hand in the assignment before Friday.
I need a dictionary to translate this text.
I want to learn another language next year.
This semester I have five very difficult subjects.
What grade/year are you in now?
I have to review the lesson for the exam.
Can you lend me your eraser to erase this mistake?
The teacher uses white chalk to write.
I have made a summary of the whole book.
I am very happy about my success in my studies.
Do you know how to translate this sentence into Spanish?
de medicina está en el otro edificio.
The medical faculty is in the other building.
I use a highlighter to mark the most important things.
I like to research new topics on the internet.
I have to practice my pronunciation more.
I received my diploma after finishing the course.
de clases cambia la próxima semana.
The class schedule changes next week.
Do you have a ruler to measure this line?
It is very useful knowledge for the future.
